resources.string: Search for GuNews app by Sirus Laia on Google Play Store\n\nGuNews. Powered by theguardian.com
Order By (Select Newest for latest news)

Note: You may see empty square boxes in this article. They are place holders for news related images. theguardian.com doesn\'t release such images for average app access. You may also see over-sized headings inside the article. Unfortunately the html parsing doesn\'t solve this issue. Sorry

Quite late to late to coding, but I have been always interested in IT.

So when I hadn't started my official Android programming course yet, I was running a project I called the Nias Keyboard Project. Basically coding for Android before learning how to code :)

I have a few apps ideas so I'm looking forward to learning enough and starting real work!

BTW the Udacity's nanodegree program in Android Basics I accomplished in July 2019 is only the beginning.

Please don't hesitate to giving me feedback. Just reach out by clicking on this floating action bar or by sending feedback in the app Settings.

News source: theguardian.com, one of the few trusted news sources nowadays. So guaranteed no fake.

Code source: The app was based on the example app by Amit Kumar Tiwari (https://github.com/Amit00a/MVVMNews). Some particular solutions are from stockoverflow.com and codinginflow.com.

Special thank you: to codinginflow.com that provides some of the best tutorials out there. His tutorials are concise but without missing the most important bits for beginners, that is not always the case with other tutorials.
